content: gnome glasses holder thank you for your interest in my pattern this pattern has not been tested so if you find typographical or numerical errors please inform me so i can correct it i can be contacted via facebook or instagram happy hooking designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items finished size base to tip of hat 10 inches tall ear to ear 10 inches wide fits adult glasses materials worsted weight #4 yarn -approx 380 yards total 4mm hook needle scissors fiber fill gauge not necessary but your finished size may vary stitches us terms slip_stitch -slip_stitch st -stitch chain -chain single_crochet -single_crochet blo -back loop only flo -front loop only increase -increase decrease -decrease pattern notes this pattern is constructed in 4 parts head nose ears beard and hat this pattern is worked in continuous rounds # single_crochet means one single_crochet in each stitch for # stitches designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items head round 1 in magic_ring 6 single_crochet 6 r2 *increase* 6 times 12 r3 *single_crochet increase* 6 times 18 r4 *2 single_crochet increase* 6 times 24 r5 *3 single_crochet
